description: This file defines the MainActivity class for an Android app built with Flutter, extending FlutterActivity to serve as the main entry point for the application.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: The main activity class for the Flutter-based Android app, extending FlutterActivity to integrate Flutter within the native Android lifecycle.

methods.name: MainActivity
methods.description: Constructor for the MainActivity class, implicitly inherited; initializes the activity as a FlutterActivity.
